message: Uh. Not to sound alarmist, but isn't this the line a certain pumpkin headed president elect keeps spouting?

PAID OFF DEMOCRATIC PUPPETS: Obama is unfit for office, because he took more PAC CORPORATION MONEY than any candidate in history and is an oligarch in an oligarchy government of USA that is no longer a Democracy. The Democratic National Convention leaders committed fraud and rigged the primary process in favor of Mrs. Bill Clinton. Basically, her candidacy is illegal as she did not win it fairly. So somebody had the audacity to defend himself when another says he never read the Constitution or never made a sacrifice for anybody. Clearly this dear couple was scripted by the Democrats and exploited them to be a taunt to Donald Trump as a political ploy. IS THERE NO SENSE OF DECENCY OR FAIRNESS ANY MORE IN THE DEMOCRATIC PARTY? As a lifelong Democrat of the fabric of JFK/LBJ/JC -- (the last real democrats in office) -- I am totally against the party as it stands today--paid off elected officials , representing only the 1% elite wealthy--controlling both the government and the national media is like a horrific sci-fi movie and worse than 1984. Whatever it takes to be sure that the CLINTONCRATIC usurpers don't get into office is our only hope. They are worse than any terrorists on earth, because they have already take over our USA Government with another political system.
Coats and thermostats.

Darcy, when you leave your child in a hot car that is a choice. If your child accidentally leaves your side for a moment, that's a different story. Not the same. I've heard many stories from great parents about things that could have ended up being a tragedy, but thank goodness, did not. One friend's child figured out how to get out of the car seat. She looked in the rear view mirror & the child was standing up. Smart kid. She pulled right over & refastened everything. If she had a car accident before she could do that & the child was injured, I guess you'd want to stone her, too. Death to all who ever erred!!!!!
